channel.title: "the Runescript upgrade work!" Your oppinion
channel.description:
Is it just me, or runescape getting annoyed of a community like this :P My thoughts (in order) To make thier horribley messed up systems even more horrible :rolleyes: To slow us curious "angels" down from success and the "KNOWLEDGE" It's being done to show those 8 year olds that they're puttin more effort in game ;) Edit: just saw S1m's post, but I guess our topics are a bit different but same subjects. Oh well if the mods don't like me they can just delete it... lol perhaps its some new scheme to attract more noobs :rolleyes:
Our ambition for 2006 is to exceed 900,000 subscribers for RuneScape, to take RuneScape into other non-english language markets and to develop further games using our technologies.

item.title: "the Runescript upgrade work!" Your oppinion
item.dc:creator: @quest_rs quest rs
item.description:
@quest_rs wrote:

Is it just me, or runescape getting annoyed of a community like this

My thoughts (in order)

To make thier horribley messed up systems even more horrible :rolleyes:
To slow us curious “angels” down from success and the “KNOWLEDGE”
It’s being done to show those 8 year olds that they’re puttin more effort in game

Edit: just saw S1m’s post, but I guess our topics are a bit different but same subjects. Oh well if the mods don’t like me they can just delete it… lol

perhaps its some new scheme to attract more noobs :rolleyes:

Our ambition for 2006 is to exceed 900,000 subscribers for RuneScape, to take RuneScape into other non-english language markets and to develop further games using our technologies.
